article_title: 3 Retail Industry Trends To Watch In 2016
article_text:
3 Retail Industry Trends To Watch In 2016

Law360, New York (January 8, 2016, 5:53 PM ET) -- The manner in which retailers operate, merchandise and develop are driven directly by the experience consumers’ demand when shopping for goods and services. The shopping environment — whether online or in store — has drastically changed due to the increased power from the consumer, bringing new areas of opportunity that also carry new risk. article_metadata.description: The emerging trends in the shopping environment that have developed over the past few years will continue to transform the way that retailers do business in years to come, including the rise of technology, the widening scope of retail to include services like health care and the shift in brick and mortar retailers, says Warren Karp at Greenberg Traurig LLP.
